subject: Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Hannes Reichelt of Austria won a World Cup super-G race Saturday in Hinterstoder, Austria, for his fifth career victory, while Bode Miller finished third.
snippet: Hannes Reichelt of Austria won a World Cup super-G race Saturday in Hinterstoder, Austria, for his fifth career victory, while Bode Miller finished third.
